blog.name: darklyfantastic
blog.title: Darkly Fantastic
blog.description:
Have you been looking for a place that is both informative and fun, when it comes to geek culture, gaming and pop-geek culture?

We entertain geeks and nerds of all stripes, ages and constructs, from the perspective of a crusty old school nerd and his contemporary team of reviewers, players and geeks.

• We play, review and comment on table top role-playing games like Dungeons & Dragons, Vampire: the Masquerade, as well as old school games like Boothill, Traveler and Chill.
• We read, review, react to and comment on all kinds of fantasy and sci-fi books and graphic novels.
• We share tips on writing fiction and fan fiction and share our experiences.
• We play, react to, review and comment on Video Games, television/web shows, and movies in the Geek collective 
• We comment and rant on overall geek related topics and culture.

tags: so if thats why things havent been updated
im trying but i dont have a clue about writing a good story
someone should just give me one of thise crappy ‘you tried’ stars
summary:
Hey so here’s a little update on my fics::
- Valentino : female V/ Jackie
I have had a brainwave and I know exactly what I want...
body:
Hey so here’s a little update on my fics::

- Valentino : female V/ Jackie

I have had a brainwave and I know exactly what I want to achieve with this fic, so sorry for the delay. Hint: there will be an “undercover as a couple” trope tee hee.

- Calm before the storm : male V/ Jackie

Ok so I know what I want to happen at the end, I just don’t know how to get there. Probably put this one on the back burner for a little while. But I might not.

- A promise I’ll try to keep : female V/ Meredith Stout

I have never written wlw so this is new but I’m getting some help. Gonna be released on Valentine’s Day so that should be good.

- unnamed : male V/ friends OC

This is gonna be more of a story set in the Cyberpunk world of Night City featuring my V and super ooc so expect that. But there’s also appearances from some familiar faces from the gameplay video. Also a lot of stuff taken from Cyberpunk 2020.

- unnamed : male V/ original male character

A little two, maybe three chapter fic about V meeting the guy in the promo poster holding the Johnny Silverhand record. Some slow burn.

tags: Last post broke and I'm posting again because I wasted too much time on this yolo
Imma gonna make these guys once the game is out and compare yo
Let me make some guys for a game without a release date!
summary: I spent way too long making my male and female V’s in TS4 soooo….wanna see them?  Juno Decker | 23 | Fixer Juno was raised in a...
body:
I spent way too long making my male and female V’s in TS4 soooo….wanna see them?

Juno Decker | 23 | Fixer

Juno was raised in a corporate family who cared more about her achievements than her feelings, often neglecting her needs. Once the pressure became too much she started ditching her evening study sessions to explore the City, anything to catch a breather. On one of her outings she witnessed the effect the corporations had on the people living in the slums. Strangely, she decided that this was the life she wanted to live: a life where she could live her own life without having to live under someone else rules. Her family now deny her existence, but she would also deny theirs. It wasn’t an easy life in the slums, but it was hers and she enjoyed living by her own rules.

Elvis Kazuki | 22 | Techie

Growing up on the streets, Elvis learnt at a pretty young age how to survive. Having to sacrifice his childhood in order to learn important skills, he now enjoys the more fun things in life as an adult. Often his easy-going attitude lands him in hot water but he knows when to get serious and fight if he has too. Being mistreated by most of the people he knew as he grew up he now finds it hard to connect to others. However it also means that he will do everything in his power to stop other going through the same abuses that he had to endure.

p.s. someone else please make their V’s in TS4 and show me plz!

blog.name: thestrelaz25
blog.title: TheStrela
blog.description: Звать Владлен, кидаю сюда всякие истории из жизни, мемчики ну и конечно же свое "авторитетное" мнение. Разрабатываю свою игру.

summary: Похоже сладенький, ты очень сильно ждёшь игру Cyberpunk 2077 (году выйдет ебать). На какой год ставишь дату выхода?
question: Похоже сладенький, ты очень сильно ждёшь игру Cyberpunk 2077 (году выйдет ебать). На какой год ставишь дату выхода?
answer:
Не то, что сильно жду, это игра номер один для меня в данный момент. (по ожиданию, она даже The Last Of Us part 2 обогнала для меня) Ибо я всегда был огромным фанатом киберпанка. (Не как все эти псевдо фанаты, которые стали таковыми после трейлера киберпанка и даже не смотрели бегущего по лезвию). Я не могу дождаться уже, я хочу уже окунуться в этот мир антиутопии полностью и на долго.

Думаю она выйдет не раньше 2021 года, в лучшем случае. Геймплей который был показан в августе прошлого года ещё очень сырой и игру ещё делать и делать.

summary:
Cyberpunk 2020 | View from the Edge sourcebook
If you’re like me and want to write fics for Chberpu k 2077 (even though the damn...
body:
Cyberpunk 2020 | View from the Edge sourcebook

If you’re like me and want to write fics for Chberpu k 2077 (even though the damn game ain’t even out yet), here’s a near list of places of interest. This is from a Cyberpunk 2020 sourcebook. The second pic is a layout of the city, not sure how much inspiration the Chberpunk 2077 team are taking from the original but it will be interesting to see what they include from the source material.

The Afterlife: the bar mentioned in the gameplay video is number 57 if you’re interested.

What’s the most interesting sounding place on this list do you think?

summary: In 2077, they voted my city the worst place to live in America.  Main issues?  Sky-high rate of violence, and more people...
caption:
In 2077, they voted my city the worst place to live in America.  Main issues?  Sky-high rate of violence, and more people living below the poverty line than anywhere else.

Cyberpunk 2077

blog.name: strigital
blog.title: A WIZARD DID IT.
blog.description:
Personal art blog with occasional sidenotes about my writing. Call me Meg and forgive me my poor English (but feel free to talk to me in Russian or Lithuanian) 
Ask me anything, don't repost my stuff and please enjoy your stay at my lair (~˘▾˘)~ ♥

tags: and that tattoo on his arm?
he must've had one helluva wild youth
summary: did y’all notice ol’ ripper Vic is wearing a TT badge on his leg? now i can’t stop thinking about young and sassy Victor in...
body: did y’all notice ol’ ripper Vic is wearing a TT badge on his leg? now i can’t stop thinking about young and sassy Victor in Trauma Team, gun in one hand, pack of meds in another… kinda like Mordin Solus - a doctor who’s as likely to gun you down as he is to save your friggin’ life. i’m really starting to like the doc!

tags: the more i rewatch the whole thing the more details like that i notice
there are so many of them i still can't believe the game is real and not an april's fool
doctor vic is now officially V's dad
summary: my favorite moment from the CP2077 gameplay demo:
title: my favorite moment from the CP2077 gameplay demo:
body:
V: shit, doc, i don't know what to say.
Doctor Victor: say you'll remember the dosage *gives V an inhaler* two whiffs now and another two in an hour.
V: thanks, Vic! you're the best!
V: *takes ONE whiff in front of Vic and does not touch the inhaler again for the remainder of the day*
Me: now that's some immersive and relatable AF shit - forgetting to take your meds on time. 10/10 would pre-order a pre-order.

dialogue.name: V
dialogue.label: V:
dialogue.phrase: shit, doc, i don't know what to say.

dialogue.name: Doctor Victor
dialogue.label: Doctor Victor:
dialogue.phrase: say you'll remember the dosage *gives V an inhaler* two whiffs now and another two in an hour.

dialogue.name: V
dialogue.label: V:
dialogue.phrase: *takes ONE whiff in front of Vic and does not touch the inhaler again for the remainder of the day*

dialogue.name: Me
dialogue.label: Me:
dialogue.phrase: now that's some immersive and relatable AF shit - forgetting to take your meds on time. 10/10 would pre-order a pre-order.

blog.name: strigital
blog.title: A WIZARD DID IT.
blog.description:
Personal art blog with occasional sidenotes about my writing. Call me Meg and forgive me my poor English (but feel free to talk to me in Russian or Lithuanian) 
Ask me anything, don't repost my stuff and please enjoy your stay at my lair (~˘▾˘)~ ♥

tags: that's it i'm making him my V's childhood hero
wish they released that song separately
i wanna listen to it 'till i'm sick of it
summary: man, Johnny Silverhand’s Chippin’ In is one helluva sick song and i’m dying of not being able to get it from somewhere or check...
body: man, Johnny Silverhand’s Chippin’ In is one helluva sick song and i’m dying of not being able to get it from somewhere or check out his other songs, ‘cause, you know… the game is like an eternity away from release date :/

reblog.comment: man, Johnny Silverhand’s Chippin’ In is one helluva sick song and i’m dying of not being able to get it from somewhere or check out his other songs, ‘cause, you know… the game is like an eternity away from release date :/

trail.content_raw: man, Johnny Silverhand’s Chippin’ In is one helluva sick song and i’m dying of not being able to get it from somewhere or check out his other songs, ‘cause, you know… the game is like an eternity away from release date :/
trail.content: man, Johnny Silverhand’s Chippin’ In is one helluva sick song and i’m dying of not being able to get it from somewhere or check out his other songs, ‘cause, you know… the game is like an eternity away from release date :/

blog.name: headlesssamurai
blog.title: 侍
blog.description: "We rode on the winds of the rising storm, We ran to the sounds of the thunder, We danced among the lightning bolts, And tore the world asunder."
